question: I've always had slightly high bp readings but since the 34wks mark its risen...I'm currently 34wk 5day and my bp is sitting on 170/90 the past 3 readings. .I'll be going into my midwife clinic tomorrow as ice had headaches abdomen vision issues accompanying it...and these were signs i was instructed to watch for due to possible preeclampsia...has anyone had any similar experiences but been ok in the end
title: high blood pressure
